description: This file defines theme-related constants and a ThemeData configuration for a Flutter application, including color schemes, input styles, button styles, and other UI theming details.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides a predefined ThemeData for consistent theming across the Flutter app using a specific color palette.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Builds and returns a ThemeData object with the Ocean Professional color palette applied, suitable for light mode.
